mapper.select: SELECT serialnumber, hotelname, sum(price) as price, count(price) as commission_count, max(commission_date) as commission_date FROM reservation where use_status = 4 GROUP BY serialnumber, hotelname ORDER BY commission_date desc, serialnumber desc
SELECT commission_date FROM reservation where use_status = 4

SELECT re.serialnumber, re.hotelname, ro.room_id, ro.type, sum(re.price) AS price, count(re.reservation_number) AS reservation_count FROM reservation AS re LEFT JOIN room AS ro ON re.room_id = ro.room_id WHERE re.serialnumber = ${serialnumber} GROUP BY re.serialnumber, re.hotelname, ro.room_id, ro.type ORDER BY ro.room_id
